segments.text: There's the adult by the sink, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's on full blast, basin overflowing steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down the front, pooling on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She steps in it unknowingly, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, cabinets hang open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy balances on a stool, hand deep in the treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool leans dangerously, but he doesn't falter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, palm outstretched expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing a secret moment of fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden looks serene with its tidy plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight highlights the water's flow and the kids' climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic case of mischief in motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes wait on the counter, part of the routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long until she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR
